withdrawal is wreaking havoc in Pakistan's internal
· Estimated $ 7bn in abandoned US military equipment

on-year increase in security personnel fatalities /2024-25)

has cost Pakistani forces their "night dominance" &
weaponzed drones introduce a new aerial threat.

L> disrupt $300 m+ bilateral trade & fueling local

ocr_full_text_page: 3.2) Sophisticated Weaponry left behind in the wake of US withdrawal is wreaking havoc in Pakistan's internal Security architecture through insurgency · Estimated $ 7bn in abandoned US military equipment has altered tactical balance _contributing to 23% year. on-year increase in security personnel fatalities /2024-25) · TIP use of night vision goggles & thermal scopes has cost Pakistani forces their "night dominance" & weaponzed drones introduce a new aerial threat. weaponized commercial drones MIG rifles Tip equipped with US weapons Night vision Goggles (NVGs) M4 carbines Javelin Missiles Thermal Imaging scopes 3.3) Pakistan's geo economic Strangulations at hands of TIP: increased violence in Chaman- Torkham sabotages trade supply · TTP strategically targets economic arteries, understanding Pakistan's economy is its 'Achilles heel" · Weaponicing trade: attacks near Torkham Chaman borders L> disrupt $300 m+ bilateral trade & fueling local anti-state sentiment · CPEC disruption: TTP coordinates with BLA in Balochistan CS CamScanner
